books.title: Sapiens
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: An exploration of human evolution from Homo sapiens to the modern age, blending history, biology, and philosophy.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.shortDesc: Build good habits and break bad ones.
books.description: A practical guide on how small consistent changes can lead to remarkable personal transformations.

books.title: Clean Code
books.author: Robert C. Martin
books.description: An essential handbook for software developers aiming to write readable, maintainable, and efficient code.

books.title: The Pragmatic Programmer
books.author: Andrew Hunt & David Thomas
books.description: A classic book offering insights, principles, and practices to become a more pragmatic and effective programmer.

books.title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
books.author: Mark Manson
books.description: A counterintuitive approach to living a better life by caring less about more and more about less.

books.title: Deep Work
books.author: Cal Newport
books.description: Strategies to cultivate deep focus and productivity in a world full of digital distractions.

books.title: Start With Why
books.author: Simon Sinek
books.description: Why do some leaders inspire action? Because they start with 'Why'—a powerful purpose behind what they do.

books.title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
books.author: Daniel Kahneman
books.description: A groundbreaking book on the two systems that drive our thoughts: fast, intuitive thinking and slow, rational thinking.

books.title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
books.author: Robert Kiyosaki
books.description: Key lessons about money, investing, and financial independence that you don’t learn in school.

books.title: Can't Hurt Me
books.author: David Goggins
books.description: The incredible life story of a Navy SEAL who turned personal trauma into strength through mental toughness.
